title: What happened to the Ultimate skin and the theories/conspiracies surrounding it?
body: I can't be the only one who was thoroughly enjoying trying to decipher the clues we got from Riot about the Ultimate skin. Since we got the clues, I have taken a few long breaks from the game, so I am just making sure I didn't miss anything. Wasn't it supposed to be released in 2014?

replies.body:
i remember reading somewhere that it was for a melee champ ill try and find the link, also there is this thread giving good proof its shaco
http://forums.euw.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?t=1855539
Nothing more has been said. It's as if Riot refuses to acknowledge it at this point.
Iirc, I read somewhere it's Pulsefire {{champion:99}}
